title: Meeting Service Level Agreements for SQL Server in VMware Environments Will Be the Focus of the Next SIOS Webinar
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/30/2015 @ 6:00 AM   SIOS Technology 
SAN MATEO, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 09/30/15 -- SIOS Technology Corp . ( www.us.sios.com ), the industry's leading provider of high availability and IT analytics software, today announced that Tony Tomarchio, SQL expert and director of field engineering for SIOS Technology, will be the featured presenter in a live webinar that will provide insights for meeting service level agreements (SLAs) for SQL Server in virtualized environments. 
Titled, "Key Insights for Meeting your SLAs for SQL Server in VMware Environments," this webinar will be held on October 6 at 10:00 AM PDT / 1:00 PM EDT. To register, please visit: https://www.mssqltips.com/webcastSignupPage.asp?id=464&src=sios 
IT professionals face the growing challenge of meeting increasingly stringent service level agreements (SLAs) for SQL Server. End users demand fast application response times and nearly continuous access to SQL Server. With VMware environments growing in size and complexity, delivering on these SLAs is more challenging than ever. In this webinar, SQL expert, Tony Tomarchio will discuss a method of delivering high availability protection for SQL Server in VMware environments without the complexities or limitations of Raw Device Mapping (RDM). Additionally, he will discuss an innovative new solution for diagnosing and resolving root causes of performance issues using machine-learning based analytics. 
About the Speaker Tony Tomarchio is the director of field engineering for SIOS Technology. Tony is responsible for defining and delivering technical pre-sales services, support and best practices to SIOS customers, prospects and partners. Tony has more than a decade of experience providing systems management and high availability solutions to enterprise customers. Prior to joining SIOS, Tony served as the global sales engineering lead for the Oracle systems management practice. Tony joined Oracle through the acquisitions of Sun Microsystems and Aduva, Inc., where he served as the lead sales engineer / technical account manager and played a critical role in product adoption and evolution. 
About SIOS Technology Corp. SIOS Technology Corp. makes software products that provide the insights and guidance IT managers need to manage and protect business critical applications in large, complex data centers. SIOS iQ is a machine learning analytics software that helps IT managers optimize performance, efficiency, reliability, and capacity utilization in virtualized environments. SIOS SAN and SANLess software is an essential part of any cluster solution that provides the flexibility to build Clusters Your WayÂ™ to protect your choice of Windows or Linux environment in any configuration (or combination) of physical, virtual and cloud (public, private, and hybrid) without sacrificing performance or availability. Founded in 1999, SIOS Technology Corp. ( http://us.sios.com ) is headquartered in San Mateo, California, and has offices throughout the United States, United Kingdom and Japan.
